Package com.esri.mo2.map.img

Classes that are used for communicating with ESRI ArcIMS components for all current versions.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Cache An Image Cache holds (in memory) copies of Image data for a particular ImageServer.
Image A simple geo-referenced image.
ImageCatalog An ImageCatalog is a kind of ImageClass that obtains imagery from one or more ImageFiles that are defined within some container object that is implementation-dependent.
ImageClass An ImageClass is a kind of MapDataset that obtains Image data from its datasource when it is searched.
ImageLayer An ImageLayer is a visual representation of a particular ImageClass.
ImageLayerSource Deprecated. - the interface has been deprecated, see Content API.
ImageReader This interface defines an access to image readers that implemented in image PlugIns.
ImageServer Provides support for an ImageServerLayer by managing retrieval of map images from ArcIMS ImageServer.
ImageServerLayer An ImageServerLayer is a visual representation of one of the supported ImageServers.
ImageWriter Writes an image to an output stream.
ServerImage A simple geo-referenced image.
SubLayerSnapshot Contains status information about the subLayers of an ImageServerLayer.
Tile A Tile is an organizational and retrieval unit of a Cache.
 

Class Summary
BaseCache Standard implementation of the Image Cache.
BaseFeatureClassProxy Defines a proxy for a FeatureClass that can be associated with LayerInfo in a LayerSource that communicates with a remote server.
BaseImageClassProxy Defines a proxy for an ImageClass that can be associated with LayerInfo in an ImageLayerSource.
BaseImageDirectory Deprecated. - the class has been deprecated, see Content API.
BaseImageDirectoryCatalog Defines a kind of "image catalog" that consists of all image files within a particular ImageDirectory.
BaseImageFile This helper class provides support for a single image file that has an accompanying ESRI-format "world" file and "prjection" file.
BaseImageLayer A standard ImageLayer implementation.
BaseImageLayerSource Deprecated. - the class has been deprecated, see Content API.
BaseImageServer Provides basic implementation of ImageServer.
BaseImageServerLayer A type of GroupLayer that presents the embedded Layers of an ImageServer.
BaseMapImageFilter An implementation of a MapFilter used for obtaining map imagery from an ImageServer.
BaseServerImage A standard implementation of a ServerImage.
BaseSubLayerSnapshot A standard implementation of a SubLayerSnapshot.
ImageDirectoryFolder Deprecated. - the class has been deprecated, see Content API.
ImageSupport Class ImageSupport encapsulates access to image readers and writers objects from PlugIns.
 

Exception Summary
ImageException A generic Exception that is thrown within the com.esri.mo2.map.img package.
ImageFileOpenException Thrown within BaseImageDirectory if an IO exception occurs when attempting to create an ImageFile.
ImageRetrievalException Thrown by several ImageServer implementations when an image retrieval (via ImageObserver) fails.
MissingSubLayersException Thrown by BaseImageLayerSource.applyDefaultExtent method if no subLayers have been defined.
 

Package com.esri.mo2.map.img Description

Classes that are used for communicating with ESRI ArcIMS components for all current versions.
